name: An Afternoon of Bach

location.name: Mazzoleni Concert Hall, Royal Conservatory of Music

description: Featuring former Toronto Symphony Orchestra's Principal Trumpet Andrew McCandless, alongside faculty and students of The Glenn Gould School, this program will include Bach's Brandenburg Concerti Nos. 2 and 5.

name: St. Patrick's Parade of Toronto
description:
The Parade has been entertaining tourists and Torontonians since 1988! 

It is a massive celebration of Irish-Canadian culture with thousands of participants and over 100 entries. Toronto's diversity is on full display with dozens of groups marching in support of their connections to Ireland and Canada. Everyone is welcome whether you were born in Ireland, have Irish ancestors or you're just looking for a great time!
